list.title: Location Services
list.title_sub: Limit When and How Often Apps Access Your Location.

list.title: Avoid Maximizing Your Charge Cycles
list.title_sub: According to Apple, after roughly 500 charge cycles, iPhones retain only up to 80% of their original battery capacity.

list.title: Turn on Low Power Mode
list.title_sub: Low Power Mode has been around for a few years now, and it's the number one best setting to enable if you're concerned about battery life.
